questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and architecture
D) Wildlife and animals

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A building facade with a decorative element
C) A natural landscape
D) An animal in the wild

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A decorative plaque with a lion's head
C) A person
D) A street performer

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A building with windows and architectural details
C) A forest
D) A beach

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A river
B) A decorative plaque
C) A car
D) A crowd of people

What is depicted on the plaque?
A) A landscape painting
B) A city map
C) A coat of arms with a lion's head
D) A family portrait

What is the purpose of the plaque in the photo?
A) To provide information
B) To serve as a decorative element
C) To mark a boundary
D) To advertise a business

What kind of windows are in the background?
A) Stained glass windows
B) Plain glass windows
C) Windows with metal grilles
D) No windows

What is the texture of the building's wall in the background?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and textured
C) Covered in graffiti
D) Transparent

What is the color of the plaque?
A) Red
B) Green
C) Black
D) Blue

What is the architectural feature next to the plaque?
A) A door
B) A window with an ornate grille
C) A balcony
D) A staircase

What is the material of the building's facade in the background?
A) Brick
B) Stone
C) Wood
D) Concrete

What is the shape of the window grille in the background?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Hexagonal

What is the artistic style of the plaque?
A) Minimalist
B) Ornate and detailed
C) Abstract
D) Pop art

What is the texture of the plaque?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glossy
D) Matte

What is the function of the metal grille on the window?
A) Decorative
B) Security
C) Ventilation
D) Privacy

What kind of maintenance does the building appear to have?
A) Well-maintained
B) Poorly maintained
C) Recently renovated
D) Neglected

What is the relationship between the plaque and the building?
A) The plaque is part of the building's decoration
B) The plaque is an advertisement
C) The plaque is a temporary installation
D) The plaque is unrelated to the building

What kind of shadows are present in the photo?
A) Soft and diffused
B) Sharp and defined
C) No shadows
D) Colored shadows

What is the likely material of the building's window grille?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Glass

What kind of architectural details are present on the building?
A) Simple and plain
B) Intricate and detailed
C) Modern and sleek
D) Rustic and rugged

What is the likely function of the round window grille in the background?
A) Decorative
B) Security
C) Ventilation
D) Privacy

What kind of weathering is visible on the plaque?
A) None
B) Slight weathering
C) Moderate weathering
D) Heavy weathering

What is the relationship between the plaque and the architectural style of the building?
A) They complement each other
B) They contrast with each other
C) They are unrelated
D) They clash with each other

What kind of architectural element is featured in the photo?
A) A column
B) A window
C) A decorative plaque and a window
D) A door
